Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Genai is providing very general answers, whereas teachers are providing direct feedback to my work.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is providing feedback without emotions. Teachers sometimes can be influenced by emotions.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI can be wrong at any time. The teacher will evaluate their feedback before providing it to me.
